Events that occurred on 28 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1911 - J.A.W. Bennett, Inkling, born in New Zealand.
1949 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 119.
1950 - Artist Roger Garland is born.
1961 - Actor Mark Ferguson is born.
2022 - Priscilla Tolkien, only daughter of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Grishnákh returns.
Éomer overtakes the Orcs just outside Fangorn Forest. Many Orcs under Mauhúr come. Fifteen Rohirrim, including Gárulf, fall.
Frodo and Samwise try to find a way through the Emyn Muil.
A fragment of the Great Horn is recovered from the fens of Entwash.
